summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting a deed to a portion of Tract 118, John J. McGilvra's Addition, a replat of Blocks 13, 14, 18 and 20 to 29 inclusive; and a portion of Block 19 of John J. McGilvra's Second Addition; together with a portion of 36th Avenue East adjoining said Tract 118 on the west for street purposes. (Vacation, 36th Avenue East; City Comptroller's File No. 263775)
